column4: my problem is, grub in installed with my other partition on the mbr (mepis)  Ubuntu is on /dev/hda1 and Mepis on /dev/hda5.  Mepis cannot automatically see Ubuntu.  I have tried to point Mepis to the Ubuntu partition but to no avail.
I have googled lots of info about how to configure grub...but grub is not getting hold of Ubuntu...I have taken hours to do this
Im about ready to blow away my Ubuntu partion and start over, though I hate to do this
